rooms.description: Two-car garage allocated on the ground floor with ample space for parking and storage.
Spacious living area designed to serve as a communal hub with natural lighting and Vastu-compliant orientation.
Modern kitchen with an open layout connecting to the dining space, adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles for energy flow.
Dining area integrated within the living space, designed for social interactions while ensuring proper ventilation.
Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony offering an outdoor view, aligned to Vastu principles for calm and relaxation.
Dedicated library space designed with ample shelving and comfortable seating areas, ensuring adequate natural light and proper circulation as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to face the auspicious direction in accordance with local building norms and Vastu principles.
Front door ensures privacy and security while being aligned with Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Balcony opening facilitating easy access from the bedroom to its spacious balcony.
